md:
giải nghĩa từ "portraying" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ đồng nghĩa.

* Portraying (verb) /pɔːˈtreɪɪŋ/:
	+ Meaning: to show or represent someone or something in a particular way, especially in a painting, film, or book.
	+ Type: verb
	+ Example sentence: "The artist is portraying the beauty of nature in her latest painting."
	+ Related words: depict, illustrate, represent, show
	+ Synonyms: depict, illustrate, represent, show

* Portraying (verb) /pɔːˈtreɪɪŋ/:
	+ Meaning: to act the part of someone or something, especially in a play or film.
	+ Type: verb
	+ Example sentence: "The actor is portraying the role of a king in the new movie."
	+ Related words: act, play, perform, impersonate
	+ Synonyms: act, play, perform, impersonate

* Portraying (verb) /pɔːˈtreɪɪŋ/:
	+ Meaning: to describe or characterize someone or something in a particular way.
	+ Type: verb
	+ Example sentence: "The author is portraying the main character as a brave and strong person."
	+ Related words: describe, characterize, depict, illustrate
	+ Synonyms: describe, characterize, depict, illustrate
html:
giải nghĩa từ "portraying" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ đồng nghĩa.

  • Portraying (verb) /pɔːˈtreɪɪŋ/:

    • Type: verb
    • Example sentence: "The actor is portraying the role of a king in the new movie."

  • Portraying (verb) /pɔːˈtreɪɪŋ/:
